Row.Text: Hello, and welcome to the Southern Isles. I am its proud leader, Hans. Can you say the same?
Why hello there, seems you came unnoticed. I am Hans of The Southern Isles. Who might you be?
No! I can't accept this! I refuse to let myself feel the pain of the past once again! Shame on you!
Didn't I say that this deal needs to be fair?
I already told you to only offer a deal that is beneficial for both of us!
Are you offering deals you know I won't accept?
Back so soon?
You sure like talking to me, don't you?
What?! I'm fine, now leave!
And what do you want this time?
Hello fellow friend. How can Hans be of your service?
Hello friend, What can I do for you this time?
Hello again my friend.
Hello friend, what brings you to the Southern Isles today?
Greetings.
What would you like to discuss?
What brings you here today?
Go on.
Let us begin. Shall we?
What do you want?
Why are you here?
What business do you have in my presence?
Oh great, you again?
Get on with it.
The end is near. What is it you wish to speak about?
Come to make peace with Admiral Westerg책rd? Clearly I sense victory in my favor. Isn't that nice?
Is it not time we ended this war?
Come to beg for mercy?
Lost the will to fight me?
What's the matter? Tired of battle?
Our military relied on your trust and you broke it. You're no match for our strength and resolve.
Calm down, we are simply friends amidst the world's stage.
This {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} must be dealt with. Don't you agree?
This war against {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} will finally settle our disputes.
Soon we'll have dealt with {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}. For the sake of peace.
Is your war going well? I certainly hope not, you seem rather lacking in military prowess.
What is it that you want? Assistance in your war effort?
You must cease your military activity near my lands immediately, or there will be severe consequences for your actions.
I have received a report that states that your military is conducting exercises around our borders. Would you care to explain this?
Oh it seems like only someone like you can swipe lands left and right! Know that there will be consequences for this.
Just letting you know, aggressive expansion means closed doors on our relationship, you have been warned.
Oh I see, buying plots of land without consulting me? How rude a peasant you are.
Your recent purchase of lands is uncalled for. I demand an immediate halt to your devious actions now.
I've heard many stories of your powerful military. Surely the enemies of this world cower in fear at your raw power.
Your nation is famed for its strong economy. I hope that in such prosperity, people like me can benefit from your success perhaps?.
Why do you have so few settlements, surely you could have more? Or is that too much responsibility for you?
No military I see. Well, my advice to you is, you better build it up.
You sneaky little devil, it seems like you have your own ways with those who are vulnerable. I like it.
I'm sorry. My apologies, too soon?
Hello friend, I have a serious matter to discuss. My relationship with {1_CivName} has broken down, and I need you to denounce them as a show of support. What do you say?
Oh I see then. Well this should show the world of your dishonest actions then.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Wow, such boldness. I'll show the world your true nature.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
If only there was someone out there who loved you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Oh, so that's how it is. We'll show you then.
Oh well then, seems like you don't trust me. I think you're the one who is untrustworthy and you know it.
Well then, I guess this is your response to the situation. The world will soon know of your treachery.
My people are appalled by your actions, and swift justice shall befall you.
I see that you've become friends with {1_CivName}. Glad to hear of it. I'm already on good terms with them myself. Maybe we could all have a ball sometime?
This leader {1_CivName} is not to be trusted. I recommend that you proceed with the relationship with extreme caution.
{1_CivName} is a good friend of mine. There will be consequences to this reckless denouncement.
Don't you agree that {1_CivName} is losing their charm?
Being on such good terms, I couldn't help but notice that you'd become friends with {1_CivName}. I have done the same. Perhaps we could all meet up at my place?
I share your conviction that {1_CivName} only causes problems for the civilizations of this world. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will teach them a lesson.
Oh great, now the vermin are breeding. Now I have to deal with both you and {1_CivName} by teaching you a lesson.
Anyone whom you don't get along with is clearly worth building a friendship with. Give {1_CivName} my regards.
I see your armies amassed near my kingdom. If you wish to attack, then come. Don't close your door on me like a little girl.
It's come to my attention that you have a large number of units near my kingdom. I request that you move them elsewhere to avoid disrupting my tight schedule.
It seems that your dishonesty has been revealed, as your conquest of {@1_MinorCivName} shows. You will face consequences for your actions
Your wanton aggression against {@1_MinorCivName} does not go unnoticed. You will face serious consequences if you should continue this action.
Your aggressive expansion makes it clear to me that you a selfish idiot, I'd warn you of your actions, but my armies are getting cranky.
I couldn't help but notice that you seem to be expanding into lands which I regard to be mine. I request that you reconsider this.
Your habit of claiming every bit of land you've spotted has not gone unnoticed. I'd advise you to discontinue this.
If you should continue to expand your nation in lands I feel are mine, it can only ruin the possibility of friendship between us.
The settling of your people near my sovereign territory is placing a strain upon relations between our two nations.
Your guarantee of not expanding near us has been retracted I'd assume. Know that there will be consequences for this.
Your land purchases worry my subjects and could cause future conflict if it continues.
Your purchase of land in my vicinity has caused some alarm. I caution you before this issue becomes more serious.
So it seems you lied when you told us that you would stop purchasing land near us. Your integrity has been swept away by a snowstorm of your own making.
It is very disappointing that you did not stop your land acquisition near my territory. I have hoped otherwise. Unbelievable!
It is hard to find worthy friends in this world. I'd like forge a Declaration of Friendship with you. What do you say?
Great leader, would you care to enter a Declaration of Friendship? My hope is that we can build a long-lasting bond between our two nations.
Let us plant the seeds of a bright future by forming a Declaration of Friendship. What say you?
This world can be cruel. Only with the friendship of others this can be overcome. Shall we join in a Declaration of Friendship?
It is hard to find worthy friends in this world. I'd like to make a public Declaration of Friendship, informing the other nations of the bond between our peoples. What do you say?
Great leader, would you care to make a Declaration of Friendship to the world? My hope is that we can build a long-lasting bond between our two nations.
Let us plant the seeds of a bright future by making a Declaration of Friendship to the world. What say you?
This world can be cruel. Only with the assistance of others can we overcome it. Shall we announce to the world our Declaration of Friendship?
Well here we are, showing the world that you're no match for them.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Can I ask an ally's favor and join me in war against {1_PlayerName:textkey}?
Diplomacy has broken down between me and {1_PlayerName:textkey} Care to join me in battle?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is a threat to the stability of this world. The time has come to deal with them once and for all. Will you assist me in this effort?
The time for war against {1_PlayerName:textkey} has come. Will you joined or have you reconsidered?
Your actions are unforgivable. There can never be friendship between our two nations.
Given the circumstances, I have no choice but to assume you are an enemy of the state. As such, I will do what I must to protect my interests.
I wanted to make it known to you that I value our friendship, and hope that it will remain strong.
It is clear to all that you are a wise and mighty ruler. I ask that you might also be compassionate towards those like myself who are weak.
Hello, my hope is that you will long serve as a person who aids for lesser leaders such as myself.
Your highly aggressive behavior has not gone unnoticed, should you keep this up, consequences await your direction.
It's clear you're a fairly uncivilized brute. I have to warn you, your actions are starting to attract quite a bit of attention from the international community.
Your warmongering is a popular topic these days. Better watch your back.
You're starting to attract quite a bit of attention. That's never a good thing, if you ask me.
It's come to my attention that you're getting a little too friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, I am ensuring their protection. I hope this conversation ends here.
I've noticed your relationship with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. While that's nice, it would be best that you leave their protection to us. I'd hate for either of us to sow discontent.
I just wanted to let you know that I think you're a witch, and I would enjoy it if you spend your last days freezing to death in a cold dark room.
Hah, glad I caught you there, I'd assume you're too busy messing your kingdom up at the moment.
I'm really getting tired of your presence, you better watch your back.
Haha, thank goodness for you I'm not ready, or else your nation wouldn't be the only thing you will be losing.
You don't seem to do well with your military. I'm sure their loyalty is at best mediocre and pathetic.
With an army so weak it's a surprise your land hasn't succumbed to revolution, which would be ripe for me to take advantage of.
It shows just how unbelievable you could possibly be to pick on the weak. What a disgrace!
It seems that your people hate your government. Just let them know that the Great Southern Isles is not far away and is willing to heed their cry for liberation.
With your barbarians being so unhappy, it's rather surprising that they'd still keep you around as their leader.
Haha, what a puny nation, did you forget where the settle button is on your UI?
It seems that your people are not enjoying your rule. They are more than welcome to stay in the Great Southern Isles.
What an interesting sight... your nation is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, beat sticks together?
Your culture isn't doing well. I guess your people seem to be inherently barbaric, don't you agree?

{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to conflict with the Great Southern Isles.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has betrayed {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
We've been over this before. The answer is still no.
Very well. I agree to avoid settling in the vicinity of your nation for the time being. Perhaps in the future you will be a more accommodating leader.
So be it. I will not settle near your lands. Cooperation is clearly not one of your strong suits.
Absolutely not! These are my lands.
That will work. May a strong friendship lead to the flourishing of our nations.
An excellent idea. May our alliance be the envy of the world.
I am happy to accept. May our nations prosper in friendship.
I must decline.
Sorry, but no. Perhaps another time.
I fear that such an arrangement is not in my best interests, so I must decline.
Thank you. I'll be off to war now on my trusty steed Sitron.
That is an intriguing offer. I accept. However, the Southern Isles is not yet fully prepared. Give me 10 turns, and I will come to you again when I am ready.
Very well. I will do what I must to maintain peace in my kingdom.
I will do what it takes to keep the peace.
Fine. But know that your despicable actions are noted.
Oh please! You're no match for Hans.
You should be well aware of your own inability to back those threats up.
You're pathetic! Just come and fight me if you want to take anything.
Umm, I'll think about it... how about no!
You dare insult me in such a manner? If you want something so badly then do your best to come and take it.
You'll have to take it over my dead body.
If you want to lay dead on the cold hard floor with my sword on your chest, then come and get some!
Unacceptable.
Don't belittle yourself with such trivial demands.
You ask for too much. I will not drive my nation into poverty to satisfy your greed.
No. I have my dignity, and refuse to hand over such a huge stake so freely.
Your desire to strip my lands of so much wealth is intolerable. Do not ask for so much.
You threaten me again so soon? I refuse your demands.
Asking again so soon? Are you sure you're not hearing things clearly?
Again I refuse! If you can't accept that, then begone!
Any offers on the table?
What do you propose?
The time has come to end this war. What do you think of this arrangement?
There is no point in this conflict continuing any further. Let us return to peace.
We must not let war define who we are. The time has come to make peace.
You have something I want. May I ask for your blessing?
Unfortunately things aren't going terribly well over here. Can you spare something for a friend? I'll try to return the favor when things are going better for me.
Although it pains me to do so, I must ask for your assistance, friend.
Your great strength is a model for all other nations. I ask that you show generosity towards those less fortunate.
Do you want to allow passage between our two nations?
I would like to negotiate passage through your territory.

I would like to establish a Research Agreement with your nation. Doing so would require each of us to spend 150 [ICON_GOLD]. What do you think?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
I feel that a Research Agreement is a mutually beneficial arrangement that would help serve to cement our Friendship.
This deal strengthened our nations and our bonds of friendship. Shall we renew this deal and continue our shared prosperity?
This deal has faded in our eyes over the years. To renew this deal, we would need more from your side of the negotiation.
My people have demanded me to get this resource for them, is this a good trade?
You dare attack us! Very well, prepare for the upcoming Hanslaught.
Very well, I hope your people like the smell of blood.
You are a monster.
You are clearly unfit to be the ruler of even the most pathetic duchy.
Fine then, I will not hesitate to protect this kingdom from treasonous people such as yourself! Prepare for war!
I may fall, but you will be dragged down with me!
Well then, I am the hero who is going to save the Great Southern Isles from destruction.
Destroy me if you can. I can promise you though, I will not fall before you easily.
So be it. My loyal armies will fight for their Great Southern Isles!
You will forever be known as a despicable brute of a person.
Ohh I see, Let's hope you will eat my sandwich of defeat soon.
Your armies are welcome to face the Hanslaught!
Attacking me only comes with the urge of determination, that I would certainly not run out.
Declaring war was a serious error of judgement on your part. I hope you reconsider this as the consequences of our victory against you will be severe.
I will not hesitate to defend our kingdom from treason.
Our forces will repel any aggression on our lands!
I will now permanently end you all!
If you wish to fight, I certainly will not back down.
Ohh so you like to play dirty? Great! I love dirty!
Ahh yes, thanks for opening the door to war. Your move now, my lady.
Very well. A maelstrom of death shall envelope us both.
While now may not be the ideal moment for us to cross swords, the opportunity to take you six feet under a large runic stone is worth it.
I won't question your decision, I hope you feel in your gut a sense of regret and guilt.
Your actions fill me with sadness... It seems that you speak with the sword, and not with your tongue.
You would attack us in such a manner? I hope that one day you will be brought to justice for this.
Taking advantage of another's weakness is unnecessary in the pursuit of victory. Surely there's a better way?
How could you do such a thing? Begone from my sight!
Taking advantage of someone's trust is appalling. Begone! I shall tell the world of your wretchedness.
It is clear that our two nations will never see eye to eye. This is something that can only be settled with military conflict, diplomacy is now out of the question.
It is clear that diplomacy is not your strong suit, now I will allow you to negotiate by the sword.
I had concealed my desire to do this for too long, but now I shall let it go!
You have betrayed your word. Make no mistake, the world will know of your treachery.
Your nation's lands are ripe for the picking, now let's feud for it, neighbour!
You borders are a bit too close to the Great Southern Isles. Now its my shot!
This world will soon be mine! No one can defeat The Hans!
Prepare yourself, The Hans is coming!
It's time I showed you my true sadistic nature!
Now, I can be the hero, saving the world from monsters that rule it!
By taking the world on, I shall save the Great Southern Isles from destruction!
Greetings world! Admiral Westerg책rd sends his regards!
The current circumstances are in my favor. Now Admiral Westerg책rd will reap this opportunity!
This stand off shall end, prepare for war.
I have been waiting a long time for this day. Now would be a good time to put your affairs in order.
It is now my time. I will defeat you and come one step closer to victory.
Current diplomatic circumstances are not on your favor. Crossing my path is a mistake you will not regret for long.
The current situation cannot be ignored. It is all or nothing.
Wow, you were dumb enough to trust me! Well here is what I think of your trust!
Your weakness presents to me a great opportunity. Your no match for The Hans.
Although the task before me may be impossible, I am compelled to find a way to defend my land to the best of my ability. I will do so or die trying.
It is clear that you are strong. I will, however, find a way to defeat you.
You are a villain without equal. Even if my kingdom falls, my soul shall forever seek vengeance against you.
Your might is unmatched, but I will find a way to defeat you.
The time to make a stand is now. The odds are not with me, but Admiral Westerg책rd will never back down!
Your military is clearly hard to defeat, but I will find ways that your mind can't fathom.
Although I do not wish it, I fear that now may be my only opportunity to defeat you. Let us meet on the battlefield.
Destruction might be the fate which awaits me, but backing down is simply not an option.
Friends? Oh if only there was someone out there who loved you.
You trust in me was clearly a misguided notion, since this has now happened.
Friendship? There was never friendship between us, now if you excuse me, I shall be off to kill your disgrace of a military.
You were so desperate for friends you were willing to work with me just like that! Well this whole time, I have been plotting you downfall, and I'll get away with it.
The odds are clearly not with me, but I see no alternative, but war. I can now only hope that my armies succeed.
So be it. Say goodbye to your navy!
Then war it is.
What is your offer for The Southern Isles?
What are you willing to negotiate?
What are your terms for peace?
There can be no peace. Perhaps another day.
This is not the time for negotiation.
We still have business to settle.
Peace? We haven't even started yet!
Excellent.
Wonderful.
Marvellous.
That is good to hear.
You have my thanks.
Thank you for accepting. We are eternally grateful.
History will long remember your great deeds.
That is a shame.
Perhaps another time then.
That is rather disappointing.
So be it.
Fine then. Do you feel the guilt yet?
You will regret this decision.
For freeing those captives, you have my thanks.
I am appreciative for the actions you have taken on behalf of my people.
Thank you. May this be remembered as a historic event which brought our two great nations closer together.
You dare chip away our agreed borders, know that there will be consequences for this.
If you are trying to provoke a war, you're doing a great job.
Well, at least you're honest. But that may be your only good trait.
Sure, like I should believe that.
I hope you're prepared for your actions.
I knew you had better sense than to play around with me.
I hope you will regret your treasonous action.
The Great Southern Isles has to maintain its hegemony.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
I hope you're prepared to regret this action.
Fine. Then leave, I have no further business speaking to you!
You disappoint us.
You know that this can only sow tension between our two nations.
I thought you might like to know that I've launched an invasion of one of your puppet states. The land of {@1_MinorCivName} will make a nice addition to the Great Southern Isles.
Oops, it seems my military has attacked your little friend {@1_MinorCivName}. What is your response then?

It's come to my attention that I may have attacked {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. While it was not my goal to be at odds with your nation, this was deemed necessary for the people of The Southern Isles.
I've been informed by Kai that my royal guards has commenced an attack on {@1_MinorCivName}. I assure you, this was not on purpose, and hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.
We should consider exchanging embassies, which would allow for more advanced diplomacy between our peoples.
We would like to set up an embassy in your capital. What do you think?
Your bullying of {@1_MinorCivName} is unacceptable. I demand that you refrain from gaining forced tribute out of city-states under my protection.
I heard about what you did to {@1_MinorCivName}. Did you not realize they are under my protection? Note there will be consequences for this.
We asked {@1_MinorCivName} for a tribute recently and they gave in. You promised to protect them from such things, but we both know you cannot back that up.
Your little friend {@1_MinorCivName} is so easy to push around. They gave in to our tribute demands, and I don't believe you are in a position to do anything about it.
It's come to my attention that I may have bullied {@1_MinorCivName}, which is under your protection. You do not put their needs above mine, I hope.

I've been informed that I have apparently taken tribute from {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. I assure you, this was quite unintentional, and I hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.

Warm salutations to you wise leader! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Freedom. The free world will be stronger with one more nation to help us all fight against oppression!
Greetings comrade! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Order. Perhaps we can find some opportunities to aid each other during our nations' next 5-Year Plans!
Welcome great emperor! I'm pleased to see you have also chosen to follow the path of Autocracy. May we work together to ensure that only the very strongest nations survive to achieve true greatness!
How did one of your agents somehow infiltrate into my secrets? Sabotage my plans? Know there will be severe repercussions over such actions.
I am willing to overlook your recent incident with a solemn hopeful promise that it won't happen again.
I'm glad you agreed to stop stealing secrets.
Your indiscretion is not a surprise.
As you request, our agents will not conduct operations in your territory.
Our agents help keep our civilization safe from all threats, including you. They operate as we need them to, not as you ask.
Thank you for bringing this {@1_CivAdjective} plot to our attention. With this warning, we will be ready for whatever they may try. Your generous aid will be remembered.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army your way in a sneak attack. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts in a sneak attack against your civilization. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
We killed your spy as it was trying to steal from us. From my experience, it is far less dangerous to read a book and try to learn something yourself.
I regret any confusion caused by our late agent's recent activity. Please let any hostile feelings end with the deceased.
Hello there. Are you here about that little spying incident?
One of my cities was recently burglarized and technological secrets were stolen. May I be assured that you had nothing to do with this?
I'm convinced you've been spying on the Southern Isles, surely espionage isn't the only language you speak, perhaps you understand sword speak?
We have taken notice of the religious conversions you are undertaking inside our kingdom. This must cease immediately.
I understand that if you won't forgive my actions.
It makes me glad that you will overlook this awkward circumstance.
I'm glad you agreed to end the missions in my kingdom.
Your religious fervour is unsettling.
As you wish, our missionaries will no longer share our faith with the people in your nation. It seems that you are intolerant to other faiths.
In spite of your protests, your citizens will continue to be enlightened by our missionaries! The one true faith will prevail!
We are anticipating your surrender hopefully under my terms.
Your surrender to me sounds like a deal.
We can make a deal now to forestall your utter annihilation.
We were very pleased to hear your recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. It seems that our goals are aligned.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} suits our interests quite nicely. You have our sincere gratitude.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is a blatant attack on our interests. I hope this does not escalate to future conflict.
I found your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} very troubling. Surely there is a better way to resolve our differences than petty politics.
Thanks to the help of your delegates, our recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was successful. We look forward to your continued support, and will try to return the favor.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} succeeded, with the support of your delegation. Together we can accomplish many great things.
Your delegation played a part in the failure of our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. I do not take such transgressions lightly.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was defeated at the hands of your delegates. Do not expect our delegation to support your interests in the future.
We thank you for entrusting the World Congress to our capable leadership. I expect great things to come in the {1_LeagueName}.
We'll see about that.
Yes, and no regrets, for this was necessary for my people.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
Very well. I will be monitoring this situation very closely.
We are not willing to offer you enough to make this a fair trade.
Any deal we suggest would result in an unfair exchange for you.
We've noticed that you've been looking for cultural artifacts within our borders. Stop stealing my dignity as a member of the Southern Isles.
Sorry, these artifacts are for the people of the Great Southern Isles to long remember.
As you wish, we will stop looking for artifacts within your borders.
Why should I allow artifacts of The Southern Isles to be taken by you?
Thank you for heeding our request. Artifacts in our nation shall fall to good hands.
No, I will not hesitate to keep digging.
We meant no offense when attempting to take our cultural heritage.
The people of my nation have been corrupted by your bourgeois messages of liberty and equality. They seem to believe they have the right to demonstrate in the streets!
Your ideological plotting has us scared of a revolution for Order in our land. Will these workers' strikes never end?
Your message of strength through supreme power has resonated with our people. Must we imitate your feared totalitarian state?
Your citizens clamor for human liberties. Tear down this wall of oppression and join the cause of Freedom and progress!
The oppressed workers of your land are unhappy. Whether you like it or not, history and current events are on our side.
Your restless people are in need of strong leadership. Join us in writing history instead of sitting there with your hands folded.
With celebration, we greet you in joining us in our quest for Freedom. Ask not what we can do individually, ask instead what we can do together.
Give us the child for eight years and it will be a socialist forever. Your working class have heard this truth; now we welcome them to our revolutionary struggle for Order.

You will not regret your move to Autocracy. All within the state; nothing outside the state; nothing against the state. Only the strong leaders of strong states can bring the world into a glorious new era together.
We are glad to see that sales of Hans merchandise and Hans fanart to tourists from your lands have reached record levels. The amazing works of our civilization are simply great!
